Cards∵

A Card is a funding instrument resource that represents a credit card. Credit card information is securely vaulted is referenced by a href. A Card may be created multiple times, each Card represented by a unique href. Each href may only be associated one time and to only one Customer. Once associated, a Card may not be disassociated from the Customer, it may only be unstored.


Available Query Filters
created_at

Available Operations: =, !=, <, <=, >, >=

Default Operation: =

Sortable: True

hash

Available Operations: =, !=, startswith, endswith, contains, !contains, in, !in, ilike, !ilike

Default Operation: =

Sortable: True

is_valid

Available Operations: =, !=

Default Operation: =

Sortable: False

meta

Available Operations: contains, !contains

Default Operation: contains

Sortable: False

Create a Card (Direct)∵

Creates a new card.

note
This method is not recommended for production environments. Please use balanced.js to create cards.
expiration_month
required integer. Expiration month (e.g. 1 for January).
expiration_year
required integer. Expiration year.
number
required string. The digits of the credit card number.
address

optional object.

city
optional string. City of the person or business.
line2
optional string. Second line of the address for the person or business.
line1
optional string. Street address of the person or business.
state
optional string. State of the person or business.
postal_code
optional string. Postal code/zip code of the person or business.
country_code
optional string. Two character country code.
customer
optional string. The customer this card is associated to
cvv
optional string. The 3-4 digit security code for the card.
name
optional string. Customer's name on card

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/cards

Balanced::Card.new

balanced.Card().save()

balanced.marketplace.cards.create()

Card(Map<String, Object> payload)

Balanced\Marketplace::mine()->cards->create()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/cards \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -d "expiration_month=12" \
     -d "cvv=123" \
     -d "number=5105105105105100" \
     -d "expiration_year=2020"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

card = Balanced::Card.new(
  :cvv => '123',
  :expiration_month => '12',
  :expiration_year => '2020',
  :number => '5105105105105100'
).save

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

card = balanced.Card(
  cvv='123',
  expiration_month='12',
  number='5105105105105100',
  expiration_year='2020'
).save()

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.marketplace.cards.create({
    "expiration_month": "12", 
    "cvv": "123", 
    "number": "5105105105105100", 
    "expiration_year": "2020"
})

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Map<String, Object> payload = new HashMap<String, Object>();
payload.put("number", "5105105105105100");
payload.put("expiration_month", 12);
payload.put("expiration_year", 2020);
payload.put("cvv", "123");

Card card = new Card(payload);
try {
    card.save();
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$card = Balanced\Marketplace::mine()->cards->create(array(
    "expiration_month" => "12",
    "expiration_year" => "2020",
    "number" => "5105105105105100",
    "security_code" => "123",
));

?>

Example Response

{
    "cards": [
        {
            "address": {
                "city": null, 
                "country_code": null, 
                "line1": null,

            "href": "/cards/CC4G1Fbv5Nw5vQ53GzcQ2mcG", 
            "id": "CC4G1Fbv5Nw5vQ53GzcQ2mcG", 
            "is_verified": true, 
            "links": {
                "customer": null
            }, 
            "meta": {}, 
            "name": null,

        }
    ], 
    "links": {
        "cards.card_holds": "/cards/{cards.id}/card_holds", 
        "cards.customer": "/customers/{cards.customer}", 
        "cards.debits": "/cards/{cards.id}/debits"
    }
}

Fetch a Card∵

Fetches the details of a card that has previously been created. Supply the uri that was returned from your previous request, and the corresponding card information will be returned. The same information is returned when creating the card.

Definition

GET https://api.balancedpayments.com/cards/:card_id

Balanced::Card.fetch

balanced.Card.fetch()

balanced.get()

Card(String uri)

Balanced\Card::get

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/cards/CC4G1Fbv5Nw5vQ53GzcQ2mcG \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL:

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

card = Balanced::Card.fetch('/cards/CC7fN4xs3PRrK3LBCuPSVxc4')

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

card = balanced.Card.fetch('/cards/CC5Buki6e4Kg4bDVZ3OSfQ8O')

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/cards/CC4G1Fbv5Nw5vQ53GzcQ2mcG')

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Card card = new Card("/cards/CC4cbNzUmFqGrc1GmFpXp6fe");

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$card = Balanced\Card::get("/cards/CC37GCk6lm0X5OdtBmkLy6qc");

?>

List All Cards∵

Returns a list of cards that you've created.

limit
optional integer. Defaults to 10.
offset
optional integer. Defaults to 0.

Definition

GET https://api.balancedpayments.com/cards

Balanced::Card.all

balanced.Card.query

balanced.marketplace.cards

Card.Collection(String uri)

Balanced\Marketplace::mine()->cards

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/cards \
      -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
      -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL:

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

cards = Balanced::Card.all

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

cards = balanced.Card.query

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.marketplace.cards

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Card.Collection cards = new Card.Collection(Card.resource_href);

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$marketplace = Balanced\Marketplace::mine();
$cards = $marketplace->cards->query()->all();

?>

Update a Card∵

Update information on a previously created card.

note
Once a card has been associated to a customer, it cannot be associated to another customer.
links
optional object.
meta
optional object. Single level mapping from string keys to string values.

Definition

PUT https://api.balancedpayments.com/cards/:card_id

Balanced::Card.save

balanced.Card().save()

balanced.get().save()

Card().save()

Balanced\Card->save()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/cards/CC4G1Fbv5Nw5vQ53GzcQ2mcG \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -X PUT \
     -d "meta[twitter.id]=1234987650" \
     -d "meta[facebook.user_id]=0192837465" \
     -d "meta[my-own-customer-id]=12345"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

card = Balanced::Card.fetch('/cards/CC7fN4xs3PRrK3LBCuPSVxc4')
card.meta = {
  'facebook.user_id' => '0192837465',
  'my-own-customer-id' => '12345',
  'twitter.id' => '1234987650'
}
card.save

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

card = balanced.Card.fetch('/cards/CC5Buki6e4Kg4bDVZ3OSfQ8O')
card.meta = {
  'twitter.id': '1234987650',
  'facebook.user_id': '0192837465',
  'my-own-customer-id': '12345'
}
card.save()

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/cards/CC4G1Fbv5Nw5vQ53GzcQ2mcG')
    .set('meta.cool', 'story')
    .save()

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Card card = new Card("/cards/CC4cbNzUmFqGrc1GmFpXp6fe");

Map<String, String> meta = new HashMap<String, String>();
meta.put("facebook.user_id", "0192837465");
meta.put("my-own-customer-id", "12345");
meta.put("twitter.id", "1234987650");

card.meta = meta;

try {
    card.save();
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$card = Balanced\Card::get("/cards/CC37GCk6lm0X5OdtBmkLy6qc");
$card->meta = array(
    "facebook.user_id" => "0192837465",
    "my-own-customer-id" => "12345",
    "twitter.id" => "1234987650",
);
$card->save();

?>

Example Response

{
    "cards": [
        {
            "address": {
                "city": null, 
                "country_code": null, 
                "line1": null, 
                "line2": null, 
                "postal_code": null, 
                "state": null
            }, 
            "avs_postal_match": null, 
            "avs_result": null, 
            "avs_street_match": null, 
            "brand": "MasterCard", 
            "created_at": "2014-03-27T16:12:31.795767Z", 
            "cvv": "xxx", 
            "cvv_match": "yes", 
            "cvv_result": "Match", 
            "expiration_month": 12, 
            "expiration_year": 2020, 
            "fingerprint": "fc4ccd5de54f42a5e75f76fbfde60948440c7a382ee7d21b2bc509ab9cfed788", 
            "href": "/cards/CC4G1Fbv5Nw5vQ53GzcQ2mcG", 
            "id": "CC4G1Fbv5Nw5vQ53GzcQ2mcG", 
            "is_verified": true, 
            "links": {
                "customer": null
            }, 
            "meta": {
                "facebook.user_id": "0192837465", 
                "my-own-customer-id": "12345", 
                "twitter.id": "1234987650"
            }, 
            "name": null, 
            "number": "xxxxxxxxxxxx5100", 
            "updated_at": "2014-03-27T16:12:35.497948Z"
        }
    ], 
    "links": {
        "cards.card_holds": "/cards/{cards.id}/card_holds", 
        "cards.customer": "/customers/{cards.customer}", 
        "cards.debits": "/cards/{cards.id}/debits"
    }
}

Deleting a Card∵

Permanently delete a card. It cannot be undone. All debits associated with a deleted credit card will not be affected.

Definition

DELETE https://api.balancedpayments.com/cards/:card_id

Balanced::Card.unstore

balanced.Card().unstore()

balanced.get().unstore()

Card().unstore()

Balanced\Card->unstore()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/cards/CC4G1Fbv5Nw5vQ53GzcQ2mcG \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -X DELETE

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

card = Balanced::Card.fetch('/cards/CC7fN4xs3PRrK3LBCuPSVxc4')
card.unstore

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

card = balanced.Card.fetch('/cards/CC5Buki6e4Kg4bDVZ3OSfQ8O')
card.unstore()

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/cards/CC4G1Fbv5Nw5vQ53GzcQ2mcG').unstore()

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Card card = new Card("/cards/CC4cbNzUmFqGrc1GmFpXp6fe");
try {
    card.unstore();
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}
catch (NotCreated e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$card = Balanced\Card::get("/cards/CC37GCk6lm0X5OdtBmkLy6qc");
$card->unstore();


?>

Associate a Card to a Customer∵

Add a Card to a specific Customer. Multiple cards may be associated to a Customer.

note
Once a Card has been associated to a customer, it cannot be associated to another customer.
expiration_month
required integer. Expiration month (e.g. 1 for January).
expiration_year
required integer. Expiration year.
number
required string. The digits of the credit card number.
address

optional object.

city
optional string. City of the person or business.
line2
optional string. Second line of the address for the person or business.
line1
optional string. Street address of the person or business.
state
optional string. State of the person or business.
postal_code
optional string. Postal code/zip code of the person or business.
country_code
optional string. Two character country code.
customer
optional string. The customer this card is associated to
cvv
optional string. The 3-4 digit security code for the card.
name
optional string. Customer's name on card

Definition

PUT https://api.balancedpayments.com/cards/:card_id

Balanced::Card.associate_to_customer

balanced.Card().associate_to_customer()

balanced.get().associate_to_customer()

Card().associateToCustomer(Customer customer)

Balanced\Card->associateToCustomer()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/cards/CC4N9xGpzdxJ3W5WWdPOqrQX \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -X PUT \
     -d "customer=/customers/CU4fnEqSkJ1GtfI9yjBE0lpC"

card.associate_to_customer('/customers/CU6Puxkmu24SfVbY0oi1fPLw')

balanced.get('/cards/CC4N9xGpzdxJ3W5WWdPOqrQX')
    .associate_to_customer('/customers/CU4fnEqSkJ1GtfI9yjBE0lpC')

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Customer customer = new Customer("");
Card card = new Card("/cards/CC4GOYzOKyWXBzJMVTs00aNk");

try {
    card.associateToCustomer(customer);
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

$card = Balanced\Card::get("/cards/CC3yyHvHx0IkXJa7oxUUHxc6");
$card->associateToCustomer("/customers/CU3veCwC1nqk9GV6dfSkRHRS");

?>

Charge a Card∵

Charge a tokenized credit card.

amount
optional integer. The amount of the debit in cents.
appears_on_statement_as

optional string. Text that will appear on the buyer's statement. Characters that can be used are limited to:

  • ASCII letters (a-z and A-Z)
  • Digits (0-9)
  • Special characters (.<>(){}[]+&!$;-%_?:#@~=\'" ^`|)

Any other characters will be rejected. Debits - Truncated to 18 characters. Credits - Truncated to 14 characters.

All Visa, Master Card, Discover, American Express debits will have a prefix of "BAL*" e.g. "BAL*marketplace.com".

ACH debits and credits do not have a prefix.

American Express pending transactions will be shown as "BALANCED INC". AMEX pending transactions are hidden by default in the American Express web portal. Once the debit is settled it will convert to "BAL*<appears_on_statement_as>".

description
optional string. Free-text description of the debit for the dashboard.
meta
optional object. Single level mapping from string keys to string values.
order
optional string. The order this debit is associated with
source
optional string. The funding instrument debited

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/cards/:card_id/debits

Balanced::Card.debit

balanced.Card().debit()

balanced.get().debit()

Card().debit(Map<String, Object> payload)

Balanced\Card->debits->create()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/cards/CC4N9xGpzdxJ3W5WWdPOqrQX/debits \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -d "appears_on_statement_as=Statement text" \
     -d "amount=5000" \
     -d "description=Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

card = Balanced::Card.fetch('/cards/CC7mV4UKT6jJOh6nerLFvHJu')
card.debit(
  :amount => 5000,
  :appears_on_statement_as => 'Statement text',
  :description => 'Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard'
)

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

card = balanced.Card.fetch('/cards/CC68IoCVpoFlkugB7xt52p8C')
card.debit(
  appears_on_statement_as='Statement text',
  amount=5000,
  description='Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard'
)

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/cards/CC4N9xGpzdxJ3W5WWdPOqrQX').debit({
    "appears_on_statement_as": "Statement text", 
    "amount": 5000, 
    "description": "Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard"
})

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Card card = new Card("/cards/CC4GOYzOKyWXBzJMVTs00aNk");

HashMap<String, Object> payload = new HashMap<String, Object>();
payload.put("amount", 5000);
payload.put("description", "Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard");
payload.put("appears_on_statement_as", "Statement text");

try {
    Debit debit = card.debit(payload);
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$card = Balanced\Card::get("/cards/CC3yyHvHx0IkXJa7oxUUHxc6");
$card->debits->create(array(
    "amount" => "5000",
    "appears_on_statement_as" => "Statement text",
    "description" => "Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard",
));

?>
